title: Mahinda Kahandagama remanded till June 8 over Galle Face attack case
body_lines: Colombo Municipal Councilor Mahinda Kahandagama was today ordered to be remanded till June 8 by Colombo Fort Magistrate Thilina Gamage in connection with the incidents took place at 'MainaGoGama' and 'GotaGoGama' on May 9. (Lakmal Sooriyagoda)
